thread.title: BRIEF-Sky Says Signs Confidentiality Agreement With Fox, Disney

title: BRIEF-Sky Says Signs Confidentiality Agreement With Fox, Disney
text: March 15, 2018 / 2:16 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Sky Says Signs Confidentiality Agreement With Fox, Disney Reuters Staff March 15 (Reuters) - Sky Plc: * CONFIDENTIALITY AGREEMENT * ‍ENTERED INTO A CONFIDENTIALITY AGREEMENT DATED 15 MARCH 2018 WITH TWENTY-FIRST CENTURY FOX, INC. AND WALT DISNEY​ * ‍AGREEMENT RELATES TO DISCLOSURE OF INFORMATION FOR PURPOSE OF ENABLING 21CF AND DISNEY TO ASSESS​ * ‍AGREEMENT RELATES TO DISCLOSURE OF INFORMATION FOR PURPOSE OF ENABLING 21CF AND DISNEY TO ASSESS AND, IF NECESSARY, OBTAIN CERTAIN ANTITRUST APPROVALS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
